flunky

So this is it. The world's most pretentious book club.

Living Up to the Name

27 Aug 2010

Okay, sorry everyone. I’ve dropped the ball during my two weeks of travel. Call it bad timing. Call it laziness. Call it whatever you want. But, rather than postpone yet another week, let’s get this weeks meeting on the calendar for this Wednesday, September 1st. After this week we’ll be back to our regular scheduled time on Thursdays.

If this is a problem for anyone let me know.
— Matt Kern
